"warum gibt es immer noch firmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verkaufen? gibt es denn keine gesetze mehr, die uns vor dieser art von 체berwachung sch체tzen? #datenschutz #privatsph채re #security"

translation:

"why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? are there no laws left that protect us from this kind of surveillance? #dataprivacy #privacy #security"

this post criticizes the fact that many companies still collect and sell personal data without proper consent or regard for privacy. it questions the effectiveness of current data protection laws and calls for stronger measures to safeguard individuals' personal information. the use of hashtags such as #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsph채re (privacy), and #security highlights the importance of this issue and reaches a wider audience interested in these topics.
